content: the pattern is free on the coats & clark website 2 pattern was featured on the knit and crochet today show episode show 104 making hats 1 a free pdf copy of the pattern is available by clicking here 3 when logged into website 1 http //www knitandcrochettoday com/episodes html 2 http //www coatsandclark com/crafts/crochet/projects/tv+projects/kct0013+his+and+her+hats htm 3 http //knitandcrochetnow com/downloadfly aspx download=productimages/104hats_pattern pdf
